issue.title: [C++] Add functionality to cpu_info to discriminate between Intel vs AMD x86
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9794](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9794). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is needed to do runtime dispatches for places where pext/pdep can be used.  These perform poorly on AMD.
